title: Small World
description: For Dolly it was lust for revenge. For Roger it was just lust.... When Leyna Shaw awoke, she was aware that something was different--terribly different. First she looked down at her tall, lovely body and saw no change. Then she looked around the room. It took her a moment to recognize it. It was the White House bedroom. Then she saw the Eye. And the Hand. The Hand came to touch her. Her legs were thrust apart, the Finger separating them effortlessly, as Leyna screamed and screamed...
author: Tabitha King
